product_name: The North Face Catalyst Micro Jacket - Men's
long_description: A technical classic for ski mountaineering and alpine climbing, The North Face Catalyst Micro men's jacket is insulated with water-repellent, 800-fill-power goose down. Premium 800-fill-power goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Water-repellent down is natural down enhanced with a finish that lets the plumes stay drier longer and dry faster than untreated down. Slim down chambers capture and maintain warmth more efficiently than wider baffles. FlashDryZ panels under arms stretch, wick moisture and speed drying to enhance comfort. Sleek, fully adjustable, helmet-compatible hood swivels with head for a natural, unobstructed view. Zip handwarmer pockets are generous and easy to access. The North Face Catalyst Micro jacket for men stuffs into its own handwarmer pocket.
short_description: A technical classic for ski mountaineering and alpine climbing, The North Face Catalyst Micro men's jacket is insulated with water-repellent, 800-fill-power goose down.
